Period I Period II make Base Study . Following 12-week treatment period Base Study , participant invite continue optional 12-week double-blind extension study ( Period III , EXT1 ) . Participants receive dose MK-0873 Base Study continue MK-0873 2.5 mg daily Period III participant placebo arm Base Study continue placebo daily . Following EXT1 , participant invite continue optional open-label second extension study ( EXT2 ) last 80 week ( Period IV : 28 week , Period V : 52 week ) . In EXT2 , participant take MK-0873 2.5 mg Base Study allocate MK-0873 2.5 mg plus usual care , participant take two dos MK-0873 placebo Base Study allocate either MK-0873 2.5 mg plus usual care usual care alone .
